/**
 @page CKCU_Clock_Configuration_LSI

 @verbatim
 * @file    CKCU/Clock_Configuration_LSI/readme.txt
 * @version V1.00
 * @date    2017-12-20
 * @brief   Description of CKCU example.
 @endverbatim

@par Example Description:

This example shows how to configure the system clock between High Speed (PLL, HSI, or HSE) and LSI.
The exmple configure the system clock as High Speed or LSI and then toggle the LED1 or LED2 for a while.

@par Directory Contents:

- CKCU/Clock_Configuration_LSI/main.c                    Main program
- CKCU/Clock_Configuration_LSI/ht32fxxxx_it.c            Interrupt handlers

@par Hardware and Software Environment:

- Use LED1 and LED2 of HT32 Development board.
- This example can be run on HT32 Series development board.
